    • User Directory
    • Navigating the User Directory
      • View all CORE user profiles and roles, Public Affairs “contact list”
      • Follow/Unfollow users; enables you to filter content produced by specific people into your Released Content feed
      • Search
      • Super Admin: activate/deactivate or delete your account
    • Organization Directory
    • View all organizations in CORE (type, owner, # of members)
      • Org owner’s contact information is available; quick way for users to reach out/coordinate with an outside organization, if needed
    • Roles
      • Publishers and Admin: Access to edit organization info, edit Page”
      • Super Admin: Contact CORE Support Team if you need help with deactivating or deleting your organization from CORE, editing your Page, Disabling Page Management
    • Follow/Unfollow organization; enables you to filter content produced by all members of an organization into your Released Content feed
    • Requesting a new organization

Subtopics
Getting Started
What is CORE?

Last updated September 18, 2018

Welcome to CORE! CORE is a web-based content management system that specializes in packaging and publishing content created by Army public affairs professionals.

As a CORE user, you can tell your Army story to the world by writing articles with our easy-to-use editor. Publishing on CORE is free! Once published, you will have a professional, Army-branded, mobile responsive article, perfect for featuring on your organization’s web page, posting on social media, or sharing with other users across the Army network. Published articles are automatically distributed to your followers in CORE and have the potential to reach millions of readers on www.army.mil.

CORE also features a User Directory and Organization list that allows users to communicate and coordinate with other members of the Army public affairs community.
